sentences.en: A series of setbacks have put the whole project in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 一系列的挫折使整个项目面临失败。

sentences.en: He was often in jeopardy of his life.
sentences.cn: 他时常陷于失去生命的险境之中.

sentences.en: His argument against the manager will put his employment in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 对经理表示异议将不利于他继续受雇.

sentences.en: His foolish behaviour may put his whole future in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 他愚蠢的行为可能毁了他一生的前程.

sentences.en: His foolish remark and behaviour may put his whole future in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 他愚蠢的言词和行为可能毁了他一生的前程.

sentences.en: If you repeat what I'm about to tell you, both our lives are in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 要是你泄露了我告诉你的事, 我们两个都有性命之忧.
杰帕迪(jeopardy)--智力竞赛就是一例.

sentences.en: Such a step will, of course, place your credIt'standing in serious jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 当然, 这样一种措施使贵方的信用处于严重的危机之中.

sentences.en: The security of this entire universe is in jeopardy!
sentences.cn: 整个宇宙安全都处在危险当中.

sentences.en: The villagers'lives were in jeopardy during the blizzard.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪肆虐期间,村民们的生命处于危险之中.
他们的前景处于危险之中.

sentences.en: There are a total of 3 contestants in one game of Jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 杰帕迪比赛时,一般都是三个人对着干.

sentences.en: Thousands of jobs are in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 数千个工作岗位岌岌可危。

sentences.en: Who put this young girl's life in jeopardy?
sentences.cn: 是谁把这个年轻女子的生命置于危险之中的?

sentences.en: Why put your town's safety in jeopardy?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能把家乡的安全置之不顾?

sentences.en: You have placed his immortal soul in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 你已经陷害了他永生的灵魂.

words.tran_cn: 危险；（被告处于被判罪或受处罚的）危险境地

phrases.tran_cn: [律]一罪不受两次审理原则；双重负担（等于double）

trans.tran_cn: 危险，危险境地，被告在法庭上有被判罪的危险
trans.tran_en: in danger of being lost or harmed
